caption.p: Growth rate (mm/day) of fungi on potato-dextrose agar (PDA) and clove (Cl) essential oil (300 Î¼g/mL). A. alternata (PDA-AA: control; Cl-AA: clove), C. hawaiiensis (PDA-CH: control; Cl-CH: clove), F. proliferatum (PDA-FP: control; Cl-FP: clove), and F. oxysporum (PDA-FO: control; Cl-FO: clove)
